name: concert-scout
description: Concert Scout AI - Find live music events tailored to your taste

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:concurrent: cd api && python -c "import requests; import threading; import time; [threading.Thread(target=lambda: requests.post('http://localhost:8000/chat', json={'message': 'drake concerts in london', 'user_id': f'user_{i}'})).start() for i in range(5)]; time.sleep(2)"
